name: Valid An active Admin creates and an active Staff grades a new assignment

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets a POST Request to valid base URL and valid end point
When  User sends a POST request to create assignment by active Admin and grade by an active staff from "POSTAssignment" and 1
Then  The response status code should be "201" Created
